author: RasPiManiac

game.author: rubenwardy
game.name: capturetheflag
game.short_description: Two or more teams battle to snatch and return the enemy flags, before the enemy takes their own!
game.title: Capture the Flag

long_description: This is a version of the Peaceful Pixels for rubenwardy's Capture the Flag. It is based slightly on Zughy's Soothing 32 but 8 pixels and more that 32 colors, just like my other regular Peaceful Pixels.
name: peaceful_pixels_ctf
short_description: A version of Peaceful Pixels made for CTF (with landmines support!)
title: Peaceful Pixels for CTF
